item.title: Piper Sandler downgrades Boston Beer after disappointing Hard Mountain Dew rollout
item.description: Piper Sandler is lowering its growth targets on Boston Beer after a recently disappointing launch of Hard Mountain Dew.

item.title: Netflix gets an upgrade from Wolfe Research after big earnings report
item.description: Netflix's strong fourth-quarter results has Wolfe Research upbeat on the stock's future.

item.title: Electronic Arts gets a downgrade from Raymond James after video game maker's guidance cut
item.description: Raymond James is stepping to the sidelines on Electronic Arts after the video game maker cut its full-year guidance.

item.title: Thursday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 rose to an all-time high in Wednesday's session. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Thursday.

item.title: Investors poured nearly $26 billion into this high-yielding corner of the fixed income market in 2024, State Street says
item.description: The chase for yield drove more than $25 billion into bank loan and collateralized loan obligation ETFs last year, the firm found.
